entry.summary: A glossy table reflects the illuminated autumn leaves outside.

entry.title: Evening Light Up・夜のライトアップ

link.title: Evening Light Up・夜のライトアップ

entry.content:
The Arashiyama Torokko “Romantic Train” runs along the Hozu River, with trees lit up for autumn leaves viewing.

Difficult to shoot this from a moving train in the dark, it took many shots to get one that was decently sharp, and much finessing in Adobe Lightroom to make this one presentable.

嵐山トロッコ列車は保津峡に沿って走り、紅葉を見るために木々がライトアップされています。

暗闇の中で動いている電車からこれを撮影することは困難でした。焦点を合わせるのは難しく、Adobe Lightroomでこれを見栄えよくするために多くの調整が必要でした。
entry.summary: The Arashiyama Torokko “Romantic Train” runs along the Hozu River, with trees lit up for autumn leaves viewing. Difficult to shoot this from a moving train in the dark, it took many shots to get one that was decently sharp, and much finessing in Adobe Lightroom to make this one presentable.

entry.title: Gated Garden・門と庭
entry.content:
Tenryu-ji Temple is known for its water garden, but it also has a rock garden with a large gate leading to the Dharma Hall.

天龍寺は曹源池庭園で知られていますが、法堂に通じる大きな門のある石庭もあります。
entry.summary: Tenryu-ji Temple is known for its water garden, but it also has a rock garden with a large gate leading to the Dharma Hall.

entry.title: Red and Orange・赤とオレンジ

link.title: Red and Orange・赤とオレンジ

entry.content:
Red maple leaves at Hogon-in Temple. It’s amazing how saturated the color of some of the leaves are.

宝厳院の紅葉。様々な葉っぱの色の鮮やかさが目を見張るようです。
entry.summary: Red maple leaves at Hogon-in Temple. It’s amazing how saturated the color of some of the leaves are.

entry.title: View from Senkoji・千光寺からの眺め

link.title: View from Senkoji・千光寺からの眺め

entry.content:
Looking out from Senkoji Temple on Mt. Arashi, you can see the autumn colors, with the city and mountains in the distance.

嵐山の千光寺からは紅葉が見られます。 また、遠くに比叡山が見えます。
entry.summary: Looking out from Senkoji Temple on Mt. Arashi, you can see the autumn colors, with the city and mountains in the distance.
